Virf Deedrickson
Class: Rogue
Race: Wood Elf
Rank: Member
Gender: Male
Salom! I believe we've never met before. My name doesn't matter, you'll only see it once, but my profession you should remember, I am a rogue. O, don't worry, your coins are safe from me, for now at least. I believe you've met my brother, Khaba. He always was the good one of us, did he tell you? That is why our names are different, our parents kicked me out of the family, he was the only only one who could look past what I "was" and see me. After our parents died, we kept in touch more, he sent me to Cablis on a mission. To show an iksar that there is better than evilness. For you see I wouldn't be here today if it weren't for him, he got me to stop thieving, but rather use my skills for the betterment of society. I did as he asked, and showed a young iksar named Griss what my brother had asked.

So, as i said your coins are safe, for now.
